OOC: I've been waiting for this for a LOOONG TIME!

BIC:  Sunhawk see's Megatron is on the run, but realizes with Hot Rod 
here it's possible noone's guarding the Predicon female.  He 
transforms and heads back to the base.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> > Arriving at the battlefield Waspinator fired a few shots at Hot
> > Rod "Waspinator engage enemy"
> >
> 
> {Talos & Grimlock}
> 
>     The ground began to shake under the heavy feet of the two 
larger bots
> bearing down on the general chaos. Grimlock seeing the shots upon 
Hot Rod
> growls and opens his metallic jaws wide, a large gout of flame 
erupting from
> within at the flying Waspinator, "Me Grimlock no like you!"
> 
>     Talos on the other hand transformed, his blast sheild 
out. "You're going
> down Megatron!" He shouted over the roar of the two flame weapons 
in use.
> 
> {Back in the ship}
> 
>     Nighshade slipped through the corridors slowly down into the 
brig area,
> looking at the controls she growled and simply smashed her fist 
through the
> blinking panel, smiling at the hiss as the magnetically sheilded 
and locked
> doors slid open freeing the housed predicons. Moving through the 
corridor
> she shouted, "Ok slackers, something bigs going down and by the way 
the
> maximals were acting it involves Megatron!"
